DOC.brief_title: 4 mg Nicotine Polacrilex Gum Swedish Portion Snus
DOC.detailed_description: Fifteen healthy smoker give single dos General Onyx 1 g portion snus General White 1g portion snus , respectively , one piece Nicorette 4 mg chew gum . Serial blood sample draw ( 0 ) , 2 , 4 , 8 , 16 , 24 , 30 , 45 , 60 minute , 1.5 , 2 , 4 , 6 8 hour administration determination nicotine . Mean + SD extract dose nicotine preparation estimate . The percentage extract nicotine content calculate . Cmax Tmax estimate . A comparison Nicorette 4 mg chew gum make . The dose absorbed systemic blood circulation ( AUC ) relation dose follow 4 mg Nicorette chew gum calculate . Self-reports subjective effect obtain 30 minute test product administer use 100 mm visual analogue scale ( VAS ) anchor `` '' `` extremely '' . The subject male female smoker , smoke minimum 7 cigarette per day . They history cardiac , kidney hepatic disease , alcohol abuse drug dependence . A physical examination include ECG blood pressure give evidence disease . No abnormality find routine laboratory screening . The subject request smoke use form nicotine containing product 8 p.m. day session last blood sample session . Previous experience show subject abstain smoke 12 hour plasma nicotine value < 4 ng/ml . A value > 4 ng/ml prior start administration lead exclusion statistical analysis . The subject must fast overnight 12 p.m. day session . No food drink allow 15 minute prior 60 minute drug administration .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer , smoke > 7 cigarette per day . No use smokeless tobacco nicotine containing product allow . Fasting overnight . Use smokeless tobacco nicotine containing product allow 8 p.m. day trial day . Subjects test Smokelyzer exhale carbon monoxide .
DOC.keyword: Nicotine Polacrilex chew gum versus Swedish Snus
